mapper.select: SELECT CL.*, I.IMG_URL FROM COUPLE_LOG CL LEFT OUTER JOIN IMG I ON(CL.IMG_ID = I.IMG_ID) WHERE CL.COUPLE_ID = #{coupleId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO COUPLE_LOG (LOG_ID, LOG_CREATED, LOG_UPDATED, LOG_TITLE, LOG_CONTENT, COUPLE_ID, LOG_LOC, LOG_DATE, CAPTION, IMG_ID) VALUES(SEQ_COUPLELOG.nextval, sysdate, sysdate, #{logTitle}, #{logContent}, #{coupleId}, #{logLoc}, sysdate, #{caption}, #{imgId} )
INSERT INTO COUPLE_LOG_IMG (LOG_IMG_ID, IMG_ID, LOG_ID, CAPTION) VALUES (SEQ_COUPLELOGIMG.nextval, {imgId}, {logId}, {caption})
mapper.select: SELECT l.LOG_ID, l.LOG_CREATED, l.LOG_UPDATED, l.LOG_TITLE, l.LOG_CONTENT, l.COUPLE_ID, l.LOG_LOC, l.LOG_DATE, l.IMG_ID, l.CAPTION, g.IMG_URL FROM COUPLE_LOG l LEFT OUTER JOIN IMG g ON l.IMG_ID = g.IMG_ID WHERE l.LOG_ID=#{logId}
